kickstart.post:
if [ -d /opt/opal ]; then #ok we have opal installed #let's deploy the
gromacs_script=/opt/cadd/bin/gromos_cluster_files.sh if test -e $gromacs_script; then $ANT -f $OPALXML deploy -DserviceName=gromos_cluster_4.5.5 -DappConfig=$OPALCONFIG/gromos_cluster_4.5.5_config.xml fi
export JAVA_HOME=/usr/java/latest export PATH=$JAVA_HOME/bin:$PATH export CATALINA_HOME=/opt/tomcat #takes a little longer in this way but less code to write /bin/su tomcat -c "/opt/opal/deployed/deploy.sh"
fi
